direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create unmodifiable versions of collections, but for different types (Bag vs. Set).
Both methods wrap existing objects to make them unmodifiable, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods handle serialization and deserialization, accessing similar resources (streams).
